data.message: I am just so tired of entertainers bringing politics into things.  Most of us use entertainment to escape reality, not to have it shoved down our throats (besides they weren't given this platform because of their political insights, but for entertainment, but at least he didn't start it at a concert like the Dixie chicks did since then someone paid to go to see entertainment, not be lectured to, etc.)

replies.message: Listen, Trumps the biggest entertainer there is! He’s was a reality show celebrity! We all are citizens no matter what our occupation. We all have a right to speak up... you don’t have to like it, but Eminem is a brilliant artist and I for one stand by him.
